attributes.action: disregard petitions against gay couples right to have children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some petitions make me so angry, the petition to stop gay couples having rights to adopt, foster and insemination is a farse, gay couples are just as qualified as a straight couple.for all you narrow minded people out there.get a life.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=adoption
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
